page.title: 08Home life,Hampton,Evesham.
page.content: I usually{wake up}at about 8.OO or 8.l5. I get woken up by Mum or my brother. For{breakfast}I have cereal,toast, and a drink of milk. I quickly rush to the bathroom before my brother gets in there.I have a wash and clean my teeth. I say goodbye to my Mum and{walk to School.}When the final bell goes we all rush out of school eager to get home. I either go to my friend's house to stay for{tea } or just to play, or she comes to my house,or my friends and I might play in the park. At 5.OO I come in for my {tea,}and after tea I sometimes play on my brothers{computer.}At 7.OO I watch {television}and at 9.OO I have a wash and clean my teeth. Then I write my {diary,}wind my clock up and go to sleep. I go to sleep dreaming of what tomorrow will bring!
